title: TL;DR
description: LaunchDarkly’s “prompt-based vs. agent” choice is about **input schemas and framework compatibility** , not execution automation. **Prompt-based mode** returns a messages array (perfect for chat UIs), while **agent mode** returns an instructions string (optimized for LangGraph/CrewAI frameworks). Both provide the same core benefits: provider abstraction, A/B testing, metrics tracking, and the ability to change AI behavior without deploying code.
